mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, email, password, self_introduction, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{self_introduction}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT users.id, categories.id AS category_id, categories.name AS category_name, learning_data.name AS learning_data_name, learning_data.study_time, learning_data.month FROM users INNER JOIN learning_data ON users.id = learning_data.user_id INNER JOIN categories ON learning_data.category_id = categories.id WHERE users.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning_data (name, study_time, category_id, user_id, month, updated_at, created_at) VALUES (#{learningDataName}, #{studyTime}, #{categoryId}, #{userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
